content: We're very focused to make sure that the investment that we put in those shows we get the returns and we believe these group of shows whether it's on the first responder side or on the sports broadcast and entertainment side, that these are the shows that drive demand and create opportunities for us to solve customer problems. There's a lot of activities and events that we participate in globally, that arenât tier one activities but are created through and captured through our Mobile Viewpoint, WMT, bonded cellular technology, as well as our own very low cost COFDM technology like we've seen with our MicroLite 3 and our DragonFly. That's why we see over their own capability, a long tail with our traditional proprietary, but as 5G evolves, and you see more 5G private networks, you're going to see opportunities to use 5G as a medium.
